solution.text:
TSA of the box= SA of 5 faces of a cuboid + [area of side semicircular faces of the cylinder] + CSA of the half cylinder
CSA of the half cylinder is given by \(\pi \times r \times h\)
Cylinder is are placed on the cuboid,\(\Rightarrow 2\times radius(r) = width\,of\,cuboid\Rightarrow r=_{{6*j}}_\)
and length of the cylinder = length of the cuboid = _{{24*j}}_
therefore area of a half cylinder=\([\pi \times _{{6*j}}_ \times _{{24*j}}_]=_{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*144,2)}}_\)
Therefore area of 5 faces of a cuboid=\( 2\times (lh+bh) + lb\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{2*24*j*4*j+2*12*j*4*j+12*j*24*j}}_\)
area of the circles on the side faces=\([\pi \times r^2=_{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*36,2)}}_]\)
TSA of the box= SA of 5 faces of a cuboid + [area of the side faces of the cylinder] + CSA of the half cylinder
\(\Rightarrow _{{2*24*j*4*j+2*12*j*4*j+12*j*24*j}}_ + _{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*36,2)}}_ + _{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*144,2)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{trunc(2*24*j*4*j+2*12*j*4*j+12*j*24*j+pi_val*j*j*36+pi_val*j*j*144,2)}}_\)
Cost of painting at a rate of Rs_{k}_ per \(cm^2\)=\(_{k}_\times _{{trunc(2*24*j*4*j+2*12*j*4*j+12*j*24*j+pi_val*j*j*36+pi_val*j*j*144,2)}}_=Rs\,_{{trunc(k*(2*24*j*4*j+2*12*j*4*j+12*j*24*j+pi_val*j*j*36+pi_val*j*j*144),2)}}_\)

content.text:
Rishab manufactures boxes which are in the shape of a cuboid surmounted by a half cylinder.
The dimensions of the cuboid are:height(h) = _{{4*j}}_ , length(l) = _{{24*j}}_ , width(b)=_{{12*j}}_
Find the cost of painting the outer surface of the box at a rate of Rs_{k}_ per \(cm^2\)
